meanings.definition: (adjective) having hair that has been bleached or lightened with peroxide
meanings.sent1: Her peroxided hair shone brightly in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The peroxided strands framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her peroxided hair made her look like a walking highlighter.
meanings.sent4: The peroxided locks were like strands of sunshine on her head.
meanings.sent5: The peroxided hair was a striking contrast to her natural dark color.

meanings.definition: (verb) to bleach or lighten hair using peroxide
meanings.sent1: She peroxided her hair before the big event.
meanings.sent2: Many people peroxide their hair for a trendy look.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally peroxided his hair green instead of blonde.
meanings.sent4: The salon will peroxide your hair professionally.
meanings.sent5: Peroxiding hair requires careful application to avoid damage.
